Description: Stereoscope photograph (black and white); a Tuscarora (?) baby in a baby carrier placed in foliage on the ground outdoors; the baby carrier has beaded floral motif decoration; Niagara Falls, New York, USA. Albumen print
Curator's comments: Related images: Oc,B56.30, 31, and 32 are the same image; Oc,B56.33 and 34 show the same baby and scene in a slightly different arrangement.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Jonathan C H King
Acquisition notes: A collection of North American, or North American associated images, including one hundred and thirty postcards, seven carte de visites, twenty one cabinet cards, nine stereo-cards, nine other photographs and five scrap prints.
